entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 07:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

Temperature: 4.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind light except northeast 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
